actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1969 which place a limitation on the capital gains treatment in the case of total distributions from qualified pension, etc., plans.

summary.text: Provides that provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1969 which place a limitation on the capital gains treatment in the case of total distributions from qualified employees' trusts and annuities are hereby repealed. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 402, 403)

titles.title: A bill to repeal provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1969 which place a limitation on the capital gains treatment in the case of total distributions from qualified pension, etc., plans.
